n = int(input())
price = [int(input()) for i in range(n)]
price.sort()
print(sum(price[1:]) + price[0]//2)


a, b = map(int, input().split())
if (a * b) % 2 == 0:
    print("Even")
else:
    print("Odd")


n = int(input())
price = [int(input()) for i in range(n)]
price.sort()

print(sum(price[1:]) + price[0]//2)

n = int(input())
p = [int(input()) for _ in range(n)]
print(sum(p) - max(p) // 2)
